item.title: 'Lot of Pride': Cowboys QB Dak Prescott Wants To Play Despite Meaningless Finale
item.description: Despite being out of playoff contention, Cowboys QB Dak Prescott is intent on finishing the season with a Week 18 win.

item.title: 'What A Great Turnaround': Clemson Faces Penn State In Pinstripe Bowl
item.description: Preseason top-four contenders Clemson and Penn State will face off in the Pinstripe Bowl amid snowstorm forecast.
